Package InvestWise

Class FilePersistence

java.lang.Object
InvestWise.FilePersistence
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPersistenceMechanism
class FilePersistence extends Object implements IPersistenceMechanism
Implements persistence operations using file-based serialization.
